availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on April 5, 1820. Campbell was working as a farmer in both 1850 and 1860. Died on January 2, 1895.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski, Division 1, p. 72B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski, District 1, p. 362; Find A Grave, " Cornelius Campbell (April 5, 1820 - January 2, 1895)," Memorial #13935312, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=13935312&ref=acom (accessed June 22, 2017).
